aircraft.value: Pegasus Swift - AC-2832-945 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Priority valve malfunction. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 18/07/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 19/07/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 23/07/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 22/07/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 25/07/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
